abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column; witness describes being framed in one of latest round of corruption cases involving New York City police officers and drugs.
snippet: A witness described being framed in one of the latest round of corruption cases involving police officers and drugs.
lead_paragraph: A witness described being framed in one of the latest round of corruption cases involving police officers and drugs.

headline.main: A Story of Drugs and the Police
